description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tug of Four is a fast-paced party game meant for three or four players. All of the players control a single ball so try to not let the ball go in your goal. Manipulate your friends in this social game so that you can win.
